name: Grunka

trait.name: Martial Advantage
text: Once per turn, Grunka can deal an extra 7 (2d6) damage to a creature it hits with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 feet of an ally of Grunka that isn't incapacitated.

action.name: Longsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage, or 6 (1d10 + 1) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Longbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

action.name: Acid Spray Gun (Recharge 5-6)
text: The hobgoblin sprays acid in a 10-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 (2d6) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
The spray gun has a tank that can be filled with ten standard vials of acid mixed with water, allowing it to be used five times.

description: Source: The Orrery of the Wanderer p. 115
